{{#if: {{{molecularFormula|}}} |* Molecular formula: {{#set: MolecularFormula={{{molecularFormula}}} }} {{{molecularFormula}}}|}}
{{#if: {{{logP|}}} |* LogP: {{#set: LogP={{{logP}}} }} {{{logP}}}|}}
